response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly exceptional. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $15,000. Considering the market conditions and the quality of our product, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $18,000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal.", "product_price": 18000}
